alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Polk; San Jacinto; Trinity; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 6:47PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN TRINITY... NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY...NORTHWESTERN SAN JACINTO...WEST CENTRAL POLK AND WALKER COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM CST... At 646 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northeastern Huntsville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Livingston, Trinity, Onalaska, Groveton, New Waverly, Point Blank, Riverside, Sebastopol, Huntsville State Park, northern West Livingston, Crabbs Prairie, and Oakhurst. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Montgomery; Polk; San Jacinto; Trinity; Walker
